title: Add event
nameYourEventPlaceholder: e.g. John Doe or Your Company Name Inc.
infoText: This name will be used only for communication purposes
insuranceCoverageLabel: Please select the amount of insurance coverage required:
foodBeingSoldLabel: Is food or beverages being sold?
foodByThirdPartyLabel: Is all food / non-alcoholic beverages being sold packaged by a third party?
alcoholCoverageLabel: Do you require alcohol coverage (maximum 50 seat capacity)?
driverLicenceLabel: Does every driver of the vehicles have a valid drivers' license?
selfTransportation: Are you responsible for providing transportation and/or chauffeuring services, or transporting attendees?
rentalVehicleOwnage: Do you have any short term rental vehicles (less than 30 days)?

errors.endDateInvalid: End date must be a date after Start date.
errors.endTimeInvalid: End time must be time after Start time.
errors.startDateInvalid: Start date must be a date before End date.
errors.startTimeInvalid: Start time must be time before End time.
